Also, if profile data to a .trcxml file, the trace XML file will has 
bad-formatted contents and wild characters.

Java, what do you mean by this:
>Also, if profile data to a .trcxml file, the trace XML file will has 
>bad-formatted contents and wild characters.

The trace file is in ZIP format, so you won't be able to load it in a text
viewer/editor.
Were you able to import the trace file ? 
If not please attach a sample trace file.

When unzip .trcxml file to .xml file, and edit it, then import this profiling 
file. The same org.xml.sax.SAXParseException will accure on Console.

Why do you need to edit it ?

Please attach a sample trace file.
